entry.title: New release for ShelfPlayer: The Siri update
entry.content:
• Rework Siri integration You can now setup shortcuts for recently listened items. More general actions are planned.
  • Notifications and the player can now link to items

  • Improved the layout on iPadOS and added hover effect

  • Show remaining time in chapter in the notable moments sheets when the option "Show chapter track" is disabled

  • Listen to all skip & seek events
  • Clarify some translations
  • Hide bookmark button when playing episodes
  • Added support for images with aspect ratios other than 1:1
  • Layout fixes & improvements
  • Added custom tint options
  • Added option to disable serif fonts

entry.title: New release for ShelfPlayer: Release 2.5.0
entry.content:
This update modernizes the systems that power ShelfPlayer. All parts of the app have been refined to improve their appearance and performance and reduce crashes.

New features include:

  • New CarPlay implementation
  • Playback queue
  • Multiple-chapter sleep timer
  • Option to collapse series
  • Playback history
  • Improved Siri integration
  • Improved handling of multi-author & -series audiobooks
  • iOS 18 tab- & sidebar

Translations:

  • New Swedish Translation: @AlexGustafsson
  • Updated Chinese Translation: @zhimiaoli
